name: Crushed Butterflies
description:
From the creator of HILL-E-S and DACommander, Crushed Butterflies takes place in reality, in a "land of feeling" known only as Nervesend.

Crushed Butterflies consists of over 100 different visualisations spread across two areas of Nervesend, featuring music from A Rose with a Bird for a Stem: The Music of Crushed Butterflies, a separate work with intersecting concepts.

Crushed Butterflies is also available via Game Jolt.
